commit.message:
Updating some basic information in POM files; moving artifacts from org.syncope to org.apache.syncope

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/incubator/syncope/trunk@1291709 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68
